channel.title: Pi Quick Prayers
channel.description: My quick prayers are working fine on my server... One problem when u click the things the checkmark doesnt show up when u click it. How Can I fix this it works still but i want checkmark to show up.

item.title: Pi Quick Prayers
item.dc:creator: @TurmoilFtwFtw TurmoilFtwFtw
item.description:
@TurmoilFtwFtw wrote:

Its hybrid pvp type base.

and its in this part messing up.

int j = 17202; for (int k = 630; (j <= 17231) || (k <= 659); ++k) { addConfigButton(j, 17200, 1, 2, "/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite", 14, 15, "Select", 0, 1, k); j++; }

Read full topic

item.title: Pi Quick Prayers
item.dc:creator: @TurmoilFtwFtw TurmoilFtwFtw
item.description:
@TurmoilFtwFtw wrote:

I am beast:

Change the “clicked” icon in your cache, might be packed.

here is what i have in rsinerface.

[code]public static void quickPrayers(RSFont[] rsFonts) {
int i = 0;
RSInterface localRSInterface = addTabInterface(17200);
addSprite(17201, 3, “/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite”);
addText(17240, “Select your quick prayers:”, 16750623, false, true, 12, rsFonts, 2);
addTransparentSprite2(17249, 0, “/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite”, 50);
int j = 17202;
for (int k = 630; (j <= 17231) || (k <= 659); ++k) {
addConfigButton(j, 17200, 1, 2, “/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite”, 14, 15, “Select”, 0, 1, k);
j++;
}
addHoverButton(17241, “/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite”, 4, 190, 24, “Confirm Selection”, -1, 17242, 1);
addHoveredButton(17242, “/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite”, 5, 190, 24, 17243);

public static void cursequickPrayers(RSFont[] rsFonts) {
int frame = 0;

addText(17235, "Select your quick curses:", 16750623, false, true, 12, rsFonts, 2);

int j = 17202; for (int k = 630; (j <= 17222) || (k <= 656); k++) {
  addConfigButton(j, 17200, 1, 2, "/Interfaces/QuickPrayer/Sprite", 14, 15, "Select", 0, 1, k);

}
	setChildren(46, tab);

something is wrong in that.
